entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 in the evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022
